doc.after: In the early 18th century English spelling was not standardized Differences became noticeable after the publishing of influential dictionaries Today s British English spellings mostly follow Johnson s A Dictionary of the English Language 1755 while many American English spellings follow Webster s An American Dictionary of the English Language ADEL Webster s Dictionary 1828 1
